Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1972...
Injured on 4/19/1977 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/9/1977 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/8/1978, off Ross Grimsley Jr. (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1981, off Marty Pattin (OAK)...
Injured on 5/24/1982 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1982, hitting .409 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against California on 6/19/1984...
